title: Shared Metacognitive Competency Enhancement Process in Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and experience with collaborative tools
context.additional_context: Systematically developing shared metacognitive strategies in online collaborative environments for science-related tasks, while strengthening practical competencies through inquiry- and design-based activities.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cognitive, social, and teaching presence during online collaboration and apply shared metacognitive components (planning-monitoring-evaluation)
Learners can systematically manage collaborative processes through group-level regulatory behaviors (task-related/group-related)
Learners can diagnose online collaborative learning environments and derive improvement strategies based on the Community of Inquiry framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
